biotools.summary: This algorithm is based on the publication by Hart et al., 2013. Reference recommends using zFPKM > -3 to select expressed genes. Validated with encode open/closed chromosome data. Works well for gene level data using FPKM or TPM. Does not appear to calibrate well for transcript level data.

bioschemas.name: zFPKM
bioschemas.summary: This algorithm is based on the publication by Hart et al., 2013. Reference recommends using zFPKM > -3 to select expressed genes. Validated with encode open/closed chromosome data. Works well for gene level data using FPKM or TPM. Does not appear to calibrate well for transcript level data.
